body_html:
Is someone currently working on this issue at the moment @bhairavmehta95 @emchristiansen? I intent to start contributing to tensorflow. I have tried to figure out the roadmap to implement the matrix_sqrt feature and this is what I have come up with:

  • Create matrix_sqrt_op.cc in tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels
  • Add matrix_sqrt_op entry to tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD
  • Write a test function in tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops_test.cc
  • Register op in tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops.cc
  • Add a MatrixSqrt entry to tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/ops.pbtxt
  • Define _MatrixSqrtGrad(op, grad) in tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py
  • Write a test function in tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/linalg_grad_test.py
  • Write a go wrapper in tensorflow/go/op/wrappers.go

Please let me know if what I have figured out is correct or if there are any changes that should be made to this plan.

 Add matrix_sqrt_op entry to tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD
 Write a test function in tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops_test.cc
 Register op in tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops.cc
 Add a MatrixSqrt entry to tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/ops.pbtxt
 Define _MatrixSqrtGrad(op, grad) in tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py
 Write a test function in tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/linalg_grad_test.py
 Write a go wrapper in tensorflow/go/op/wrappers.go

Please let me know if what I have figured out is correct or if there are any changes that should be made to this plan.
body:
Is someone currently working on this issue at the moment @bhairavmehta95 @emchristiansen? I intent to start contributing to tensorflow. I have tried to figure out the roadmap to implement the matrix_sqrt feature and this is what I have come up with:

- [ ] Create `matrix_sqrt_op.cc` in `tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels`
- [ ] Add `matrix_sqrt_op` entry to `tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD`
- [ ] Write a test function in `tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops_test.cc`
- [ ] Register op in `tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops.cc`
- [ ] Add a `MatrixSqrt` entry to `tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/ops.pbtxt`
- [ ] Define `_MatrixSqrtGrad(op, grad)` in `tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py`
- [ ] Write a test function in `tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/linalg_grad_test.py`
- [ ] Write a go wrapper in `tensorflow/go/op/wrappers.go`

Please let me know if what I have figured out is correct or if there are any changes that should be made to this plan.
